title: SunshineFreedom
author: SunshineFreedom
content: This is a legal jobI'm looking for a python programmer to audit some code for a small ecommerce website that accepts crpyto.I can pay in Bitcoin or XMR.Email me at:so.Where.is.the.Love@protonmail.com

comments.author: SunshineFreedom
comments.body: Thanks for reaching out.  I'm not a big fan of telegram's privacy policy.  Please email me your resume and we can setup an interview.I'm the most interested in your experience with Django and crypto payments.
